blog.name: the-average-garbage
blog.title: The Average-Garbage
blog.description: Hey, I'm Josh. An 18-year old brazillian, gamer, beginner artist and pretty much into your average aesthetics. I mostly reblog stuff, and post my art, though I rarely have the motivation to draw. I'm pretty much into a lot of American and Japanese...

title: Tag meme...
body:
Tagged by @doctor-kappa

Well, let’s give it a shot.

Rules: Answer the questions and tag up to 10 or more followers, mutuals, etc.

1. What is your most recent main series game you own?: Pokemon White 2

2. Favorite Type?: can’t decide.. Grass? Ice? 

3. What Pokemon would you hitch a ride on?: Golurk! I want my own Iron Giant. But if I needed a flying one, Latios/Mega Latios is very probable

4. Favorite starters of each type?: Bulbasaur, Popplio, Fennekin

5. What Pokemon would you let sleep in your arms?: Ribombee or Buneary. The latter reminds me of my actual pet bunny.  

6. Favorite Shiny Pokemon?: Shiny Sylveon!

7. Favorite Legendary Trio: I’ve always been fascinated with the Lake Trio 

8. Favorite spin-off: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon, absolutely!

9. Favorite Poke Ball: Any ball that has a flashy send-in animation, I don’t try many different Pokeballs most of the time so I haven’t formed a favorite.

10. Use this Pokemon fusion site and click random, then share a picture of what you got.

Yikes, that’s hideous. I don’t even know what else to say about this.

Well, I’ve done everything now all that’s left is to tag some people. 

No need to do it if you don’t want to, but I have to follow the rules

@corsolanite @n-switch @yushicus @yupi-yu @apollysabyss

summary: Bandai is treating Digimon Adventure the same way Game Freak is treating Pokemon Gen 1. AKA They're shoving it in our faces when...
body:
Bandai is treating Digimon Adventure the same way Game Freak is treating Pokemon Gen 1.

AKA They’re shoving it in our faces when what we really want is new stuff. (e.g. Digimon Survive and Pokemon Gen 8)

title: Staryu - 120
body:
This Pokemon gets nibbled on by Lumineon and others. Thanks to its red core, it regenerates fast, so it’s unconcerned by their snack attacks.

- Pokemon Moon

blog.name: inikavulpixelreviews
blog.title: Let's Talk About Pokemon!
blog.description:
Reviewing my personal opinion on every single Pokemon! Yes, all 809 of them!
(Mostly) Daily Uploads, 3 PM EST.

summary: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - The Litwick Family
title: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - The Litwick Family
body:
607: Litwick

For an objectmon, this line got it off pretty well. Surprisingly enough, the whole of this line are pretty much widely loved a lot more than they’ve gathered any disdain for being “just candles and lamps and  things”

And I have to say good on that. Because who can resist a little face like that? Litwick is an adorable little candle-ghost with a lovely purple flame and looking like a melty pile of wax with a cute little smile on it. And it’s just precious how they melted wax on top has formed something of a hairdo on the thing, covering one of its eyes. Too cute! What’s not-so-cute is its dex entries. That flame is apparently fueled by life energy that it sucks from humans and Pokemon after pretending to be a guide through dark places.

Baby boy, baby…

Personal Score: 8.5/10

Evil…

608: Lampent

Lampent is by far the least noticed out of these three, which is as you’d expect from a middle-evolution that lacks the cute appeal of the first stage but the cool appeal of the last. But I’d most certainly say the thing’s a little under-appreciated.  While maybe not having the same unique charm as Litwick, Lampent’s certainly got a likable aspect or two about it. The thing goes from a cute candle to being more like a full-on lantern. I’d certainly say I at least like it just as much as I like Litwick.

But its dex entries get even spookier, believe it or not. Like Litwick, it feeds on souls to fuel its flame. But what it’s apparently notorious for doing is floating ominously around hospitals, waiting to catch departing souls. Yes, the Pokedex went there.

Personal Score: 8.5/10

Cursed Pokemon.

609: Chandelure

And here is actually one of Gen 5’s fan-favorite Pokemon. It’s easy to see why, because it manages to capture cute, cool and scary all at once with its design. You could even argue the thing is really pretty looking, too. It keeps the beady yellow eyes its previous two stages had. It has a “mouth” looking like it’s stitched shut, and some cool, curly “arms” for chandelier, well, arms. It really gives the thing some Nightmare Before Christmas vibes, which I will do anything but complain about. And what makes a cooler Ghost type than a ominous, floating candle-lit chandelier. A spooky chandelier is a must for haunted houses!!

The Pokedex entries certainly keep up with the spookiness too. It’ll hypnotize people and then burn their living souls still inside their bodies, leaving the empty husk just lying around. And apparently spirits it burns actually aren’t gone forever, just being left to wander Earth forever? I guess something about the soul-burning process prevents spirits from ever passing on to the actual afterlife.

Personal Score: 9/10

Very spooky!

Overall:

Not at all disappointing of a line. One of those Pokemon I never realized I needed badly until Gamefreak actually made it.

[Archive]

[[MORE]]

blog.description:
German Pokémon Fan.    On here, I post the Pokémon Gifs I made during my Rewatch of the Show. etc. And also gifs from the newest Episodes.
German posts (coz I use this blog for everything, actually just Pokémon) are made privat at first to not spam my followers dash.  
You better read this. 
-----------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gifs, Pictures Videos etc I post are made/taken by me. There are probably people who made the same gif/pic, but I can't check the whole internet, ya know.

blog.name: quarkmaster
blog.title: Quark Master's Tumblr
blog.description:
FYI: The Tags on the left of posts and in the red bars above are filter tags.
Click on a tag to filter on posts with the same tag. Also, I can't easily reply to a reply of a post. If you have a question, use Ask Anything

The vast majority of these posts come from artist websites. All non-reblogged posts should have the artist name and a link to their website.

summary: Flygon fanart Flygon (Pokémon) fanart I made earlier this year as a contribution to the 3rd version of the Chilean Pokédex...
caption:
Flygon fanart

Flygon (Pokémon) fanart I made earlier this year as a contribution to the 3rd version of the Chilean Pokédex Project, which can be found here: https://www.instagram.com/proyectopokedexchile/
Flygon in its nest, being approached by a Diaguita-inspired warrior.


Marco González

trail.content:
Flygon fanart

Flygon (Pokémon) fanart I made earlier this year as a contribution to the 3rd version of the Chilean Pokédex Project, which can be found here: https://www.instagram.com/proyectopokedexchile/
Flygon in its nest, being approached by a Diaguita-inspired warrior.


Marco González

title: tag thing meme owo
body:
tagged by @riotsourninja

okay lets do this owo

Rules: Answer the questions and tag up to 10 or more followers, mutuals, etc.

1. What is your most recent main series game you own?: omega ruby

2. Favorite Type?: water is so beautiful <3

3. What Pokemon would you hitch a ride on?: i’ll take to the skies with charizard!!

4. Favorite starters of each type?: litten, mudkip (OWO) and turtwig

5. What Pokemon would you let sleep in your arms?: a phantump bc they need it

6. Favorite Shiny Pokemon?: shiny surskit is so cool!!!

7. Favorite Legendary Trio: the creation trio because screaming dragos

8. Favorite spin-off: i play mystery dungeon more than any spin-off

9. Favorite Poke Ball: the heavy ball looks pretty rad

10. Use this Pokemon fusion site and click random, then share a picture of what you got.

… eh

well i guess this is where i tag some people but i dont know that many so just these 2

@spiral-phantoms @the-average-garbage

tags: when they showed Lyra in the trailer for ss/hg I was devastated
that's why I'm always trying to bring back my girl Crystal
summary: this is the first pokemon fanartist I see that also includes kris and leaf/blue with the gen 1-2 boys and not just lyra/kotone....
question: this is the first pokemon fanartist I see that also includes kris and leaf/blue with the gen 1-2 boys and not just lyra/kotone. I love it! I love you!!
answer: It’s because I love Crystal with all my heart and I will never accept Lyra as her replacement!

reblog.comment: It’s because I love Crystal with all my heart and I will never accept Lyra as her replacement!

trail.content_raw: It’s because I love Crystal with all my heart and I will never accept Lyra as her replacement!
